content.question: At the end of the second paragraph, the author claims that “these instances are not adduced with a view of proving that it is desirable to open such professions to women” primarily to

choices.label: suggest a more inclusive approach toward gender in the military
distance herself from a perspective that could be supported by the evidence she cites
undercut an argument she feels compelled to acknowledge
extend her argument about equality of mind to equality of physical capabilities

content.answer: distance herself from a perspective that could be supported by the evidence she cites

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
